title: Track Remediation of a Prior Audit Finding
description: An auditor follows up on a high-risk finding from a previous audit to ensure it has been remediated by management.

tasks.description: Identify the prior audit finding and the agreed-upon management action plan, including the implementation date.
tasks.expected_outcome: Auditor retrieves the details of the finding and the promised fix.

tasks.description: Contact the business owner responsible for the action plan to get an update on the status.
tasks.expected_outcome: The business owner states that the fix has been implemented.

tasks.description: Perform testing to independently verify that the corrective action has been implemented and is effective.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor's testing confirms the control is now working, allowing the finding to be officially closed.
